headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, UI elements, and labels.

primary.description: Deep, trustworthy blue. Use for primary backgrounds in hero/footer and primary text.

accent.description: Metallic gold. Use sparingly for borders, active states, and primary buttons.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-24. Avoid cramped layouts.
layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Asymmetric). Avoid equal-width columns for features.
layout.border_radius: rounded-lg (8px) for cards, rounded-full for buttons.

visual_enhancers.gradients: NO generic gradients. Use subtle noise overlays or solid colors.

buttons.primary: bg-[#0F172A] text-white hover:bg-[#1E293B] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-slate-900/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#0F172A] border border-[#0F172A]/10 hover:border-[#0F172A] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.accent: bg-[#D4AF37] text-white hover:bg-[#B5952F] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold tracking-wide

cards.room_card: bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 group
cards.feature_card: bg-slate-50 p-8 rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 hover:border-[#D4AF37]/30 transition-colors

inputs.default: h-12 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-[#0F172A] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#0F172A] rounded-lg

hero_images.usage: Main Hero Background or Primary Slide

homepage.hero: Split screen. Left: Bold Typography 'Elevate Your University Life' + CTA. Right: High-quality room image with floating 'Available Now' badge.
homepage.features: Bento Grid layout. Mix of large and small cards. Use icons for '24/7 Security', 'Fast WiFi', 'Study Rooms'.
homepage.cta: Full width Navy background. Gold text. 'Secure Your Room for Next Semester'.

rooms.layout: Grid of 2 columns (Mobile 1). Large images. Price prominent in Gold.
rooms.filters: Horizontal scrollable pills on mobile. Sidebar on desktop.

booking.layout: Multi-step wizard. Clean, distraction-free. Progress bar at top.
booking.summary: Sticky sidebar on desktop, bottom sheet on mobile.

must_do: Use the provided user assets for room displays.
